snippet: Green Bay linebacker Clay Matthews summed up the problem with the NFL's current overtime rule quite nicely when not even Aaron Rodgers' latest heroics could save the Packers from yet another playoff loss....
lead_paragraph: Green Bay linebacker Clay Matthews summed up the problem with the NFL's current overtime rule quite nicely when not even Aaron Rodgers' latest heroics could save the Packers from yet another playoff loss.

headline.main: Only Guarantee From NFL's Overtime Rules Is Unhappy Loser
headline.print_headline: Only Guarantee From NFL's Overtime Rules Is Unhappy Loser
